about.title: About This Place
about.subtitle: Where magic and nature unite
about.intro: Here, at the edge of the forest, a special place has unfolded ‚Äì a place to pause, to recharge, and to find yourself again. The ancient trees whisper their stories, the fire pit invites you to quiet moments under the starry sky.
about.fireplaceText: Here you can find peace, watch the flames, and simply be. A place of warmth and comfort.
about.forestText: Right next to us, nature stretches out in all its power. Let yourself be invited to walks that clear the mind and open the heart.
about.outro: This place is more than just a place to stay ‚Äì it's an invitation to reconnect with yourself and nature.

tinyHouse.title: Tiny House with Cave
tinyHouse.description: A magical retreat in nature ‚Äì currently under construction. Here, comfort and earthiness come together.

description.du: Deep relaxation and purification for body and soul. Soon you can find peace here.
description.sie: Deep relaxation and purification for body and soul. Soon you can find peace here.

hotTub.title: Hot Tub
hotTub.description: Relax in warm water under the open sky and watch the stars ‚Äì pure magic.

lifeTraining.title: Life Coaching
lifeTraining.description: Personal guidance on your journey. Find yourself, gain clarity and inner strength.
